preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 33.1 g of Bismuth Oxide using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh out 20.0 g of Lithium Carbonate. 
 3. Weigh out 10.0 g of Rubidium Carbonate. 
 4. Combine all dry ingredients in a clean ceramic or glass container. 
 5. Mix thoroughly using a mortar and pestle until a uniform powder is obtained.
